column5: Fix high memory usage when writing a carefully crafted EFI filesystem
column6: commit 5f3079c8aa1973b40964e1ba3846bb3d1e3020aeAuthor: Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>Date:   Mon Jun 5 10:29:50 2023 +0100    Fix high memory usage when writing a carefully crafted EFI filesystem        OSS-Fuzz managed to create an XML file that used more than 2560Mb of RSS when    writing. Limit each EFI file to 16MB and the entire FS to 256MB.        Fixes the other half of https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=59249
